message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, even considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer, but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $8,000 at this time.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. While I understand your position, $8,000 is significantly below its value. Could you consider $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $11,000 is still a little steep for my budget.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,500?
